name: Astroline
description:
This is Ludum Dare 47 submission, it was made in 72 hours with the theme: Stuck in a loop. You play as astronaut, stuck in a loop of one minute re-spawn cycle, that is the only human left on a giant ship.

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shooting/ Punch

RMB - Throwing weapon/Leg kick

R - Reload/Respawn

E- Interact

This is a bloody top-down action shooter, play as the only colonist left on a giant spaceship attacked by dangerous and clever virus. Everyone is controlled by the head spiders, army of zombies trying to infect you! Giant biomass of brains and tentacles in the reactor compartment and no help within a radius of hundreds of light years! Head spider is sitting on your head destroying your brain every 60 seconds, you are stuck in a loop of dying and cloning your body to move forward... will you make that to the end?

If you can, please rate it there https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/astroline
